description:
A party to celebrate the founding of Death Weapon Meister Academy erupts into chaos when Medusa and her minions unleash an assault on the school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`incubo Della Vigilia. E così si alza il sipario?
Le cauchemar le soir du festival. Le rideau se lèvera-t-il ?
The Eve Party Nightmare: And So the Curtain Rises?
Zen`yasai no Akumu: Soshite Maku wa Agatta?
前夜祭の悪夢 ~そして幕は上がった?~
